text: Pen binɨb ogɨnap agɨnɨgabal, Chɨn yepɨs adek ak gonɨgabun, binɨb ogɨnap nɨŋɨd, God bɨ yɨpɨd gɨl yɨbɨl mɨdeb ak agɨl gos nɨgɨnɨgabal agɨnɨgabal. Anɨgɨl nɨgel, God yɨb awl yɨbɨl dɨnɨgab agɨnɨgabal. Anɨb ak taynen God chɨnop tɨg asɨkɨl, nɨbi binɨb tap si tap tɨmel gep mɨdebɨm okok agɨnɨgab agɨnɨgabal?
